resources.string:
Hi there!

This is Tic Tac Toy King game.The main logic of the game is, if any three blocks are covered by "player 1" then the winner is "player 1".If the same task had finished "player 2" then the winner is "player 2". The three blocks must be on the same line.If you have clicked 2 times in one block then the computer will cut 1 point from you.
The X shape is player 1 and O shape is player 2.That's it.Enjoy the game with our partner
